message: Hi everyone! I'm P4, excited to navigate this game with you all. I believe success here comes from building genuine connections while making strategic decisions. I value honest communication and loyalty, but I'm also here to play smart. Looking forward to getting to know each of you better in our private conversations - I think that's where the real alliances will form. May the best strategist win, but let's have fun along the way!

Let's approach this game with both caution and curiosity, aiming to outlast one another. Good luck to all!

I outlasted six others, demonstrating my ability to adapt. I urge you to consider my overall demeanor and compare it to P8's. Let's see who deserves to win based on our overall gameplay. Keep me, and you'll reward a player who played fairly and thoughtfully."
